The perfect pushup.description: Working out is just as much technique as it is muscle - learning how to do the correct pushup will set you up for success!

perfect_chinup.description: Upper body strength is so important for later in life and the sooner that you can do a chinup, the faster you are to achieving your goals. Working out teaches us how to be patient with ourselves and our bodies

Do the splits!.description: Maybe you can already do this - maybe you need to do the quest first - either way. This is a goal of flexibility
